Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-23170 affecting package hvloader for versions less than 1.0.1-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-23170 affecting package hvloader for versions less than 1.0.1-6. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package hvloader is earlier than 1.0.1-6, affected by CVE-2024-23170
